faqPage.title: Frequently Asked
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, returns, and more.

products.a1: Eternal roses are real roses that have been specially preserved to maintain their natural beauty for years. Through a unique preservation process, these roses retain their soft texture, vibrant colors, and natural appearance without requiring water or sunlight.
products.q2: How long do eternal roses last?
products.a2: Our eternal roses are designed to last 2-3 years or even longer with proper care. Keep them away from direct sunlight, humidity, and extreme temperatures for the best longevity.
products.a3: Yes! Our eternal roses start as 100% real roses. They are carefully selected at their peak bloom and undergo a special preservation process that replaces their natural sap with a plant-based solution, maintaining their beauty indefinitely.
products.q4: Can I customize the engraved necklace?
products.a4: Currently, our necklaces come in three beautiful colors: Gray, Gold, and Rose Gold. The heart design symbolizes eternal love. We're working on adding custom engraving options soon!

shipping.a1: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50. For orders under $50, a flat rate of $4.99 applies.
shipping.a2: Standard shipping typically takes 5-10 business days. Express shipping (2-4 business days) is available for an additional fee. During peak seasons like Valentine's Day, please order early!
shipping.a3: Yes, we ship worldwide! International shipping times vary by destination, typically 7-21 business days. Import duties and taxes may apply depending on your country.
shipping.a4: Absolutely! Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also track your order through your account dashboard.

returns.a1: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with your purchase, contact us within 30 days for a full refund or exchange.
returns.q2: How do I initiate a return?
returns.a2: Simply email our support team at support@eterngift.com with your order number and reason for return. We'll provide you with a prepaid return label and process your refund within 5-7 business days of receiving the item.
returns.q3: Are there any items that cannot be returned?
returns.a3: For hygiene reasons, we cannot accept returns on items that show signs of use or damage caused by the customer. All items must be in their original packaging.

payment.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a1: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secured with 256-bit SSL encryption.
payment.a2: Absolutely! We use industry-standard SSL encryption and never store your full credit card details. Your payment is processed securely through Stripe, a PCI-compliant payment processor.
payment.a3: Yes! We partner with Klarna and Afterpay to offer Buy Now, Pay Later options. Split your purchase into 4 interest-free payments.

care.q1: How do I care for my eternal roses?
care.a1: Keep your eternal roses in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and humidity. Avoid touching the petals frequently as oils from your skin can affect the preservation. Gently dust with a soft brush if needed.
care.q2: Can I put eternal roses in water?
care.a2: No! Eternal roses should never be placed in water as they are already preserved. Water will damage the preservation and ruin the roses.
care.q3: How do I clean the necklace?
care.a3: Clean your necklace with a soft, dry cloth. Avoid contact with water, perfumes, and chemicals. Store in the provided jewelry box when not wearing.
